mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (res_idx, pat_idx, pro_idx, res_time, res_chk, pay_chk, contact) VALUES (res_idx_seq.NEXTVAL, #{pat_idx}, #{pro_idx}, TO_DATE(#{res_time}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), 1, 0, #{contact})
mapper.update: UPDATE reservation SET pat_idx = #{pat_idx}, pro_idx = #{pro_idx}, res_time = TO_TIMESTAMP(#{res_time}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') WHERE res_idx = #{res_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER (ORDER BY res.res_idx DESC) AS rank_idx, res.*, pat.pat_name, pro.pro_name, dept.dept_name FROM reservation res LEFT JOIN patient pat ON res.pat_idx = pat.pat_idx LEFT JOIN professor pro ON res.pro_idx = pro.pro_idx LEFT JOIN department dept ON pro.dept_idx = dept.dept_idx ) subquery WHERE rank_idx BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT p.*, d.dept_name FROM professor p JOIN department d ON p.dept_idx = d.dept_idx
